attributes.action: Supply vibrators to single women on the nhs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sexually frustrated women are to be honest dangerous.I propose that these women that are single for longer than 28 days should be supplied with a vibrator from their doctor.If after 6 months they are still single then they should be made to have sex with inmates of our prisons which will reduce tension for both parties.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
